resources.string: You were transferred into the Mesa District for the last few months of your mission. I got called to be the district leader at the same time. That meant I was able to talk to you every day!:)
You finished your mission at the end of January and I was super sad for you to leave! It was exciting to be able to start emailing you as a friend instead of only talking as missionaries.
During the next several months, we emailed, sent super long voice recordings, and wrote letters to each other:)
I came home at the end of August and guess who drove down for the homecoming! I drove up to your house in Idaho a few days later and suddenly we were dating… ;)
After just two months of dating, I proposed by showing up at your house at night with "mail" for you just like I did in the mission… Except this time it was a wedding ring.
We got married in the Bountiful, Utah temple on December 28th, 2022. We stayed at an AirBnB in Bountiful for a few days and then moved up to our new apartment in Rexburg, ID.
